commit message: Not debuggable, fixes logic issue when dismissing search progress dialog.
Should fix string decoding issue that only appears on Android. Thanks Dalvik we love you.

First bits for new desktop upload files.
Implemented audio focus logic.
Stop torrent is async now.
New ephimeral playlist.
Typo in class name.

First version of new media player framework.
Ready to test prev/next buttons.
Playlists can have a title.
renamed openAudioList to playEphemeralPlaylist on UIUtils
Graphics for new media player controls previous and next.
changelog update
Media player supports swipe gestures to change the song.
Only the play/pause button requests focus.

FrostWire's media player is now friendly to users driving cars.

When you start playing a song it disables the screen lock so you can switch to the next or previous song with a swipe gesture to the left or to the right.

No battery is wasted because the screen time out settings are preserved.
Pause or resume playback by touching the screen with more than 2 fingers. Drive safely. Keep your eyes on the road.
Version bump and changelog update.
version bump
Notifies the media player of Telephony activity so it can pause and recover properly.
Refactor on pause() now togglePause(). Adds new methods to detect if player is active and to seek.
removed warning

Desktop transfer in the phone side complete. Ready to test.
